Title: Use of OsiriX in developing a digital radiology teaching library
Abstract: Copyright © 2014 The Royal College of Radiologists.Widespread adoption of digital imaging in clinical practice and for the image-based examinations of the Royal College of Radiologists has created a desire to provide a digital radiology teaching library in many hospital departments around the UK. This article describes our experience of using OsiriX software in developing digital radiology teaching libraries.
